18:01 <scottw> has joined #xwiki  
18:02 <scottw> is now known as <scottbw>  
18:06 <scottbw> hi XWiki folks, I'm working with an initiative pairing up students with FLOSS projects called Semester of Code (i.e. not GSoC :) Is it the kind of thing the XWiki community might be interested in participating in?  
18:06 <vmassol> hi scottbw, sounds intereting  
18:06 <vmassol> \*interesting  
18:07 <vmassol> http://semesterofcode.com/ ?  
18:07 <scottbw> thats the one  
18:07 <mbloom> has joined #xwiki  
18:07 <scottbw> (btw Vincent, I'm the same scottbw who maintains htmlcleaner...)  
18:08 <vmassol> oh nice! :)  
18:08 <vmassol> (didn't realize)  
18:08 <scottbw> :)  
18:08 <vmassol> in any case I'm sure the xwiki community will be very interested by this initiative  
18:08 <vmassol> if you could post it on the users or devs list that would be awesome  
18:09 <vmassol> oteherwise I'll do it when I'm back (I'm currently on holidays, today is bank holiday in France ;))  
18:09 <vmassol> since we're not doing GSOC this year, we could do this one (I need to read more to see how it works and how organizations are selected)  
18:10 <scottbw> its a "pilot" programme so its quite open  
18:10 <vmassol> cool  
18:10 <scottbw> and in any case, as money doesn't change hands its a lot simpler admin-wise than GSoC  
18:10 <vmassol> yeah  
18:11 <scottbw> we did try to use Melange for the platform same as GSoC... but that was err \*complicated\* so we're adapting Drupal  
18:11 <vmassol> should have used xwiki! :)  
18:11 <scottbw> :D  
18:12 <scottbw> I shall post something to dev@xwiki ... enjoy the holiday  
18:12 <vmassol> thanks a lot for letting us know about this!  
18:13 <scottbw> no problem!
